Package com.mlt.desktop.control

Class Control

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
Direct Known Subclasses:
Button, Canvas, Label, MenuBar, MenuItem, Pane, Slider
public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
Base control, essentially a component wrapper, intended to expose only the methods strictly necessary for its functionality.
